name: get_hsn_tsn
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hsn_tsn.
Tool description: With this API you can find out the key number of over ~30,000 vehicles. The available vehicle data includes: 
Insurance classes (liability, partial, comprehensive), vehicle name, year of manufacture, power (hp), engine displacement (cc), fuel, HSN and TSN.

Supported manufacturers are: 
Aiways, Alfa Romeo, Alpina, Audi, Barkas, BMW, Borgward, Buick, Cadillac, Chevrolet, Chrysler, CitroÃ«n, Cupra, Dacia, Daewoo, DAF, Daihatsu, Datsun, Dodge, DS, e. GO, Fiat, Ford, Genesis, Glass, Great Wall, Ha...
API description: Search for dedicated car. Year is optional. Records are limited by 100 rows.

query.description: The search query for the car.

year.description: The year of the car. Defaults to 2018.
